Played 1.3 to Source before a hiatus. Played on and off during 2013 and 2014, but it wasn't the same. I feel this is a good free FPS for competitive play, but there are issues with bullet registration, more so than in 1.3, 1.6, or Source. I haven't played on LAN yet, but expect it to be much more fluid and registration better. I recommend it because it is free, but don't get sucked into buying weapon skins or unlocking loot crates for cash unless you decide to dump 1k+ hours into the game. Once you start you may get rare weapon skins you can sell for cash. I do miss being able to insert custom skins from the community without having to pay. All in all it is a good game.
